name: Bomber Survival
description:
Bomber Survival!

Bomber Survival is a game of living in a swfsasdfasdfasdfasdfasd   sewer and TRYING TO SURVIVE! YOU CAN'T ESCAPE, RANDFADSF------- You get everything! From beds, tofafsasdfasd fasdfad-f-as-df   US GETTING REVENGE. WE WILL GET YOU, RAN----2-4-534-5-3-45-3-45-3-45-34   Haha. Don't mind that guy. Anyways, enjoy your stay!

Details and controls:

J - Spawn bomb

WASD - Move

N - Detonate all bombs.

T - Useless shield.
